DOC.brief_summary: This study will provide clinical data in an observational setting. Individuals undergoing LSG, and who meet study entry criteria, may be enrolled. LSG procedures will be performed according to institutional standard-of-care (SOC) using the study stapler. All study subjects will be followed for approximately 4 weeks for safety and outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Powered Stapler System on Surgical Interventions Required During Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy
